description.name: HSS twist drill for metal with cobalt 12,5 mm
description.long_desc:
Metal drill bit made of HSS M35 high speed steel with the addition of 5% cobalt. Drills according to DIN 338. Cylindrical handle.


The cobalt alloy guarantees high thermal resistance and thus increases wear resistance. A perfectly ground edge guarantees even faster and more precise drilling. The ground spiral ensures high accuracy and rapid removal of the spoil. The tip is ground in two stages at an angle of 125 °, which allows drilling without pre-marking.


Product features:



  • drill made of high-speed steel HHS-CO M35

  • The 5% cobalt content significantly increases the thermal resistance

  • very good removal of the spoil thanks to the ground spiral

  • 2-step tip ground at an angle of 125 °

  • perfectly ground cutting edge


 


Technical Specifications:


Steel: HSS-CO M35


Cobalt content: 5%


Size: 12.5mm


Point: 2-stage, ground at an angle of 125 °

description.name: HSS Cobalt drill M35 3flutes sharp 3,5 mm
description.long_desc: Drill Bit HSS M35 extremely heat resistant cobalt-alloyed (5% cobalt addition) high speed steel produced according to DIN 338. Cylindrical shank. Increases wear resistance. The perfectly ground edge guarantees even faster and accurate drilling. Triple flutes ensures high accuracy and rapid removal of spoil. 125° point angle design for maximum accuracy of application; no pre-punch or pilot required.

description.name: Impact electric wrench Viper
description.long_desc:
KLUCZ UDAROWY ELEKTRYCZNY DO KÓ VIPER HEIDMANN 1/2" 2kW 800Nm 2600 obr/min

Elektryczny klucz udarowy Viper 800Nm 1/2"

Udarowy klucz elektryczny zaprojektowany z myl o pracach garaowych i warsztatowych. Zasilany elektrycznie o mocy 2000W idealnie nada si do uycia w warsztatach samochodowych ale take w przydomowych garaach przy majsterkowaniu.

  • moment obrotowy na poziomie maksymalnym ;800 Nm
  • maksymalne obroty klucza - ;2600 obr/min
  • moliwo szybkiej wymiany szczotek wglowych (doczone w zestawie)
  • trzpie klucza ;1/2"
  • w zestawie 4 nasadki wykonane ze stali CrV w rozmiarach: ;17, 19, 21, 22 mm
  • walizka z tworzywa sztucznego
  • szczotki wglowe

Specyfikacja techniczna

  • Napicie znamionowe: ;230V ~50Hz
  • Prdko obrotowa: ;2600 obr/min
  • Moc: ;2000W
  • Maksymalny moment udarowy: ;800Nm
  • Kocówka nasadki: ;1/2"
  • Obroty: ;lewo/prawo
  • Nasadki w zestawie: ;17, 19, 21, 22 mm
  • Certyfikaty: ;CE

  • Certyfikaty: ;CE

category.name: Specialized Tools for Vehicles
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Specialized Tools for Vehicles

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Specialized Tools for Vehicles

description.name: Fender Reforming Extending Tool Kit
description.long_desc:
Fender roller can be used to increase the clearance between the tire and the fender to fit larger tires, repair the dent or damage of the fender.


Product Features



  • Increase the clearance between the tire and the fender to fit larger tires

  • Equipped with adjustable arm allows this fender roller for 180 degrees

  • Wheel swivel

  • Attached hitch pin allows for wide or narrow anglefits most cars and light trucks with 4 and 5 lugs
description.short_desc:

category.name: Car Ramps
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Car Lifts\Car Ramps

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Car Lifts\Car Ramps

description.name: Car Ramp Hydraulic Lifting Jack 2T
description.long_desc:
Heavy duty 2 ton vehicle ramps with hydraulic jack built in. Perfect for use at home, or professional garage. Posiada 4 stopniow blokad wysokoci.


Product Features



  • Lift capacity up to 2000 kg

  • Angle of incline 20°

  • With hydraulic jack with safety / overload valve

  • Secure bolt for securing the raised vehicle

  • Height adjustable from 240 to 350 mm

  • Tyre size up to 230 mm wide

  • Platform size: 300 x 248 mm

  • Ramp size [L x W]: 780 x 270 mm

  • Ramp total size [L x W]: 1120 x 320 mm

  • Package: 116 x 38 x 30 cm

description.name: Steel Ramp foldable 2200kg 2pcs
description.long_desc:
GEKO ramp kit, includes two folding heavy duty ramps for cars or motorbikes with tire width up to 225 mm. These dual purpose steel car ramps can be used as a loading ramp up to 550mm or as a car ramp riser for heights of 155 mm. Increased grip and safety due to perforated surface.


Product Features



  • Can be used in an unfolded and folded state

  • Load capacity when unfolded using as loading ramps: 250 kg per unit or 500 kg per pair

  • Load capacity when used as a wheel riser: 1100 kg per unit or 2200 kg per pair

  • 1830 mm length when unfolded
description.short_desc:

  • Load capacity when used as a wheel riser: 1100 kg per unit or 2200 kg per pair

Women's Work Gloves with Nitrile Coating s.7
description.long_desc: Women's Work Gloves with Nitrile Coating. The gloves meet the EN 388 standard (so-called anti-cut gloves).
description.short_desc: Women's Work Gloves with Nitrile Coating. The gloves meet the EN 388 standard (so-called anti-cut gloves).
description.description: Women's Work Gloves with Nitrile Coating. The gloves meet the EN 388 standard (so-called anti-cut gloves).

description.name: Blue polyester liner foam latex coated with finger double dipped s.8
description.long_desc:
Work gloves made of polyester. In addition, the entire hand is covered with foam latex, which makes the gloves very durable and does not restrict work. Reinforced fingertips with modified, grooved latex.


Gloves are often used for all kinds of mechanical, garden, construction and household work.


Product features:



  • size 8

  • reinforced fingertips

  • gloves coated with a soft foam with a porous structure

  • high resistance to cuts and tears.

  • finished with a welt
